title: I Become a Rogue Lord in a World Where Only I Level Up - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Army   Army Building   Assassins   Beautiful Female Lead   Cheats   Clever Protagonist   Conflicting Loyalties   Cunning Protagonist   Depictions of Cruelty   Fantasy World   Fearless Protagonist   Game Elements   Genius Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hidden Abilities   Kingdom Building   Kingdoms   Level System   Loyal Subordinates   Magic   Magic Formations   Male Protagonist   Multiple POV   Nobles   Quirky Characters   R-15   Rebellion   Romantic Subplot   Royalty   Schemes And Conspiracies   Servants   S*aves   Soldiers   Special Abilities   Strategic Battles   Strategist   Strong Love Interests   Strong to Stronger   Sudden Wealth   Sword And Magic   Sword Wielder   Transmigration   Transported into a Game World   Tribal Society   Unique Weapons   Wars   Weak to Strong   Wealthy Characters
author: Warui Otoko   わるいおとこ
description:
I've become a rogue lord in another world!
This is the story of a game I was playing!
The story of the protagonist, who has become a rogue lord who dies after two days, successfully uses the game's history and system to escape his impending doom and become the strongest.>
